name: THE TEAR
description: An immersive VR adventure in a fantastic world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 1000 MB available space Additional Notes: VR VIVE
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/ /Quadro P5000 equivalent or better, AMD Radeon Vega 56 equivalent or better Storage: 1000 MB available space Additional Notes: VR VIVE
